name: Ext_R5_Device_co_specification
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Device.conformsTo.specification for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Device.conformsTo.specification from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Identifies the standard, specification, or formal guidance that the device adheres to
element.definition: Code that identifies the specific standard, specification, protocol, formal guidance, regulation, legislation, or certification scheme to which the device adheres.
element.comment: `Device.conformsTo.specification` has no related element in R4B:Device

element.short: Identifies the standard, specification, or formal guidance that the device adheres to
element.definition: Code that identifies the specific standard, specification, protocol, formal guidance, regulation, legislation, or certification scheme to which the device adheres.
element.comment: `Device.conformsTo.specification` has no related element in R4B:Device

binding.description: The type of version indicated for the device.
